author: Андрій О
title: The Hotel has an outstanding location in Manhatten - Review
text: There is something very special about this place. All the staff is extremely friendly and welcoming. I stayed there multiple times and will be coming back a lot more. Every time a make a reservation I send a message to Lucas requesting a high floor and a nice view and every time my requests are honored.
